--- named_schemas_create_index.sql
CREATE INDEX sch1.indexOnSingers ON sch1.Singers(FirstName)
--- AST
&ast.CreateIndex{
  Create:       0,
  Rparen:       58,
  Unique:       false,
  NullFiltered: false,
  IfNotExists:  false,
  Name:         &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 13,
        NameEnd: 17,
        Name:    "sch1",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 18,
        NameEnd: 32,
        Name:    "indexOnSingers",
      },
    },
  },
  TableName: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 36,
        NameEnd: 40,
        Name:    "sch1",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 41,
        NameEnd: 48,
        Name:    "Singers",
      },
    },
  },
  Keys: []*ast.IndexKey{
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: -1,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 49,
        NameEnd: 58,
        Name:    "FirstName",
      },
      Dir: "",
    },
  },
  Storing:      (*ast.Storing)(nil),
  InterleaveIn: (*ast.InterleaveIn)(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE INDEX sch1.indexOnSingers ON sch1.Singers(FirstName)
